text: The 2001 season was the St. Louis Rams' 65th in the National Football League (NFL), their seventh in St. Louis and their second under head coach Mike Martz. ==Roster== St. Louis Rams 2001 final roster Quarterbacks * Marc Bulger * Jamie Martin * Kurt Warner Running Backs * Trung Canidate * Marshall Faulk * James Hodgins FB * Robert Holcombe * Justin Watson FB Wide Receivers * Isaac Bruce * Az-Zahir Hakim * Torry Holt * Yo Murphy * Ricky Proehl Tight Ends * Ernie Conwell * Brandon Manumaleuna * Jeff Robinson LS Offensive Linemen * Frank Garcia C/G * Rod Jones T * Andy McCollum C * Kaulana Noa G * Tom Nütten G * Orlando Pace T * Cameron Spikes G * John St. Clair T * Adam Timmerman G * Ryan Tucker T Defensive Linemen * Chidi Ahanotu DE * Tyoka Jackson DT * Leonard Little DE * Sean Moran DE * Ryan Pickett DT * Grant Wistrom DE * Brian Young DT * Jeff Zgonina DT Linebackers * Brian Allen ILB R * O.
